question_stem:
Consider Breast Cancer data (Topic2_EDA_4.pdf) which have variables "pmh.use" (Yes/No) and "cancer" (Absent/Present).  The contingency table of percentage is extracted from the lecture note and given below (please revise the data and the values given in the data) before answering the question.

What is the value 60.5% referring to?
